attributes.action: Arrest and charge with incitement to hatred any person issuing death threats against another person or group.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is appauling to have to witness  angry crowds of Islamists jumping around with placards filled with death threats directed at British and other European people,glorifying acts of terrorism! So far we have not held counter demonstrations, because we would be arrested. The police are put in danger,and these violent and abusive gatherings, should be stamped on before they get out of control. This of course applies to any other group demonstrating in such a manner.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
